item.title: Quick EA on Messier and Herschel Catalogues
item.description: Quick EA on Messier and Herschel Data Sets Purpose: I have had this data set for a while. I was curious to see if there were any patterns within it. While this analysis is exploratory in nature and I didnâ€™t set out to answer a particular question, I did, however, find myself asking questions. Like how did Messier miss all the objects that Herschel had found in Ursa Major (Big Dipper)?
